briefTitle: Randomized, Controlled Study of CF Patients Between 3 Months and Less Than 7 Years
conditions: Treatment of Early Pulmonary Infections With P. Aeruginosa in Cystic Fibrosis Patients

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of cystic fibrosis
* Early lower respiratory tract infection with P. aeruginosa,

Exclusion Criteria:

* Known local or systemic hypersensitivity to aminoglycosides or inhaled antibiotics.
* Administration of loop diuretics within 7 days prior to study drug administration.
* Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants P Aeruginosa-free After Completion of the First Treatment Cycle
Percentage of Participants Free From P. Aeruginosa 28 Days After Termination of the Second Treatment Cycle
Percentage of Participants P Aeruginosa-free at Termination of the Double Blind Period
